author: N'dea Yancey-Bragg
title: Female world leaders are handling coronavirus crisis 'in a really impressive manner,' experts say
description: Germany, New Zealand, Taiwan and Iceland acted quickly and decisively in response to the coronavirus pandemic. They're all led by women.
content:
Cincinnati Enquirer staff writer Ann Sacker explains the steps you should take if you believe you have the novel coronavirus.
USA TODAY
